org.drupal.project.async_command.deprecated
Class AbstractDrupalAppDeprecated

java.lang.Object
  org.drupal.project.async_command.deprecated.AbstractDrupalAppDeprecated
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultDrupalAppDeprecated, JythonDrupalApp
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public abstract class AbstractDrupalAppDeprecated
extends java.lang.Object

all external program/script should extends this class for easier access. If using SQL queries, please follow SQL-92 standard to allow maximum compatibility.
